CustomField.description:
E2B (R2): B.1.7.1a.1, patientepisodenamemeddraversion (8AN) E2B (R2): B.1.10.7.1a.1, parentmdepisodenamemeddraversion (8AN)
E2B (R3): D.7.1.r.1a MedDRA Version for Medical History E2B (R3): D.10.7.1.r.1a MedDRA Version for Medical History Conformance: Optional, but required if D.7.1.r.1b is populated. Data Type: 4AN OID: None Value Allowed: Numeric and ‘. ‘(dot)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If applicable, MedDRA terms should be used in the main description for disease or surgical procedures.
CustomField.label: MedDRA Version for Medical History
